title: Lisa Ling & Sara Haines
description:
Lisa Ling joined The View in 1999 at just 26 years old and spent three years on the panel — she and co-host Sara Haines talk about their time on the show. They share their fond memories of the show’s creator Barbara Walters and look back on some of the craziest moments on air! Hear Lisa discuss the one moment she regrets on the show and listen to Sara reflect on her early days guest co-hosting the show and her decision to come back on the panel after leaving in 2018.
Listen to "The View" weekdays on your favorite podcast app! Just search for "The View" on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you like to listen. For more: https://abcaudio.com/podcasts/the-view
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
